CpxThermometer¶

Overview¶

This widget calculates the temperature of clinopyroxene formation using its chemical composition or the composition of clinopyroxene-liquid pairs.

Key Features: - Offers various thermometric formulas for specific needs.

Input¶

  • Preprocessed dataset: - Preprocessed clinopyroxene composition. - Preprocessed clinopyroxene-liquid pairs.

Errors¶

  • Machine Learning models (e.g., Jorgenson, Petrelli) are not functioning correctly.

Orange3-Volcanoes
